00015 #include "nmrfspectrumform.h"
00016 #include "nmrfspectrum.h"

00018 #include "signalgenerator.h"
00019 #include <qspinbox.h>
00020 
00021 #include "nmrspectrumbase.cpp"
00022 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NMRFSpectrum, "NMR frequency-swept spectrum measurement");
00023 
00024 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 XNMRFSpectrum::XNMRFSpectrum(const char *name, bool runtime,
00026                              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00027                              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00028                              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00029                              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00030     : XNMRSpectrumBase<FrmNMRFSpectrum>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00031       m_sg1(create<XItemNode<XDriverList, XSG> >("SG1", false, drivers, true)),
00032       m_sg1FreqOffset(create<XDoubleNode>("SG1FreqOffset", false)),
00033       m_centerFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("CenterFreq", false)),
00034       m_freqSpan(create<XDoubleNode>("FreqSpan", false)),
00035       m_freqStep(create<XDoubleNode>("FreqStep", false)),
00036       m_burstCount(create<XUIntNode>("BurstCount", false)),
00037       m_active(create<XBoolNode>("Active", true))
00038 {
00039     connect(sg1(), true);
00040 
00041     m_form->setCaption(KAME::i18n("NMR Spectrum (Freq. Sweep) - ") + getLabel() );
00042 
00043     m_spectrum->setLabel(0, "Freq [MHz]");
00044     m_spectrum->axisx()->label()->value(KAME::i18n("Freq [MHz]"));
00045   
00046     centerFreq()->value(20);
00047     sg1FreqOffset()->value(700);
00048     freqSpan()->value(200);
00049     freqStep()->value(1);
00050 
00051     m_lsnOnActiveChanged = active()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(  
00052         shared_from_this(), &XNMRFSpectrum::onActiveChanged);
00053     centerFreq()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00054     freqSpan()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00055     freqStep()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00056 
00057     m_conSG1FreqOffset = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_sg1FreqOffset, m_form->m_edSG1FreqOffset);
00058     m_conCenterFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_centerFreq, m_form->m_edCenterFreq);
00059     m_conFreqSpan = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freqSpan, m_form->m_edFreqSpan);
00060     m_conFreqStep = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freqStep, m_form->m_edFreqStep);
00061     m_conSG1 = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_sg1, m_form->m_cmbSG1);
00062     m_form->m_numBurstCount->setRange(0, 15);
00063     m_conBurstCount = xqcon_create<XQSpinBoxConnector>(m_burstCount, m_form->m_numBurstCount);
00064     m_conActive = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_active, m_form->m_ckbActive);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void
00068 XNMRFSpectrum::onActiveChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00069 {
00070     if(*active()) {
00071         m_burstFreqCycleCount = 0;
00072         m_burstPhaseCycleCount = 0;
00073         shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00074         if(_sg1) _sg1->freq()->value(*centerFreq() - *freqSpan()/2e3 + *sg1FreqOffset());
00075         onClear(shared_from_this());
00076     }
00077 }
00078 bool
00079 XNMRFSpectrum::onCondChangedImpl(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) const
00080 {
00081     return false;
00082 }
00083 bool
00084 XNMRFSpectrum::checkDependencyImpl(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &) const {
00085     shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00086     if(!_sg1) return false;
00087     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse = *pulse();
00088     if(_pulse->timeAwared() < _sg1->time()) return false;
00089     return true;
00090 }
00091 double
00092 XNMRFSpectrum::getMinFreq() const{
00093     double cfreq = *centerFreq(); //MHz
00094     double freq_span = *freqSpan() * 1e-3; //MHz
00095     return (cfreq - freq_span/2) * 1e6;
00096 }
00097 double
00098 XNMRFSpectrum::getMaxFreq() const{
00099     double cfreq = *centerFreq(); //MHz
00100     double freq_span = *freqSpan() * 1e-3; //MHz
00101     return (cfreq + freq_span/2) * 1e6;
00102 }
00103 double
00104 XNMRFSpectrum::getFreqResHint() const {
00105     return 1e-6;
00106 }
00107 double
00108 XNMRFSpectrum::getCurrentCenterFreq() const {
00109     shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00110     ASSERT( _sg1 );
00111     ASSERT( _sg1->time() );
00112     double freq = _sg1->freqRecorded() - *sg1FreqOffset(); //MHz
00113     return freq * 1e6;
00114 }
00115 void
00116 XNMRFSpectrum::afterFSSum() {
00117     double freq = getCurrentCenterFreq() * 1e-6;
00118     //set new freq
00119     if(*active()) {
00120         shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00121         ASSERT( _sg1 );
00122         ASSERT( _sg1->time() );
00123 
00124         double cfreq = *centerFreq(); //MHz
00125         double freq_span = *freqSpan() * 1e-3; //MHz
00126         double freq_step = *freqStep() * 1e-3; //MHz
00127         if(cfreq <= freq_span/2) {
00128             throw XRecordError(KAME::i18n("Invalid center freq."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00129         }
00130         if(freq_span <= freq_step*2) {
00131             throw XRecordError(KAME::i18n("Too large freq. step."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00132         }
00133       
00134         if(_sg1) unlockConnection(_sg1);
00135         
00136         int burstcnt = *burstCount();
00137         double newf = freq; //MHz
00138         m_burstFreqCycleCount++;
00139         if(burstcnt) {
00140             newf += freq_span / burstcnt;
00141             if(m_burstFreqCycleCount >= burstcnt) {
00142                 m_burstFreqCycleCount = 0;
00143                 newf -= freq_span;
00144                 m_burstPhaseCycleCount++;
00145             }
00146         }
00147         if(!burstcnt || (m_burstPhaseCycleCount >= 4)) {
00148             m_burstPhaseCycleCount = 0;
00149             newf += freq_step;
00150         }
00151         
00152         if(_sg1) _sg1->freq()->value(newf + *sg1FreqOffset());
00153         if(newf >= getMaxFreq() * 1e-6 - freq_step)
00154             active()->value(false);
00155     }   
00156 }
00157 
00158 void
00159 XNMRFSpectrum::getValues(std::vector<double> &values) const {
00160     values.resize(wave().size());
00161     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < wave().size(); i++) {
00162         double freq = minRecorded() + i*resRecorded();
00163         values[i] = freq * 1e-6;
00164     }
00165 }
